Passage: Io co gurutwakarshanle malai kasari tanchha? yadi tapain io co satahama ubhinubhayo bhane, tapainko wazan prithwimabhanda come hunechha. Prithvima 200 pound (90 kilo) taulako wyakti ioma karib 36 pound (16 kilo) taul hunthyo. tyasaile tapainlai gurutwakarshanle come tanchha.

Question: anuchhed anusar, nimna madhey kun loko gurutwakarshanbarey sahi kathan ho?

choices.A: prithviko gurutwakarshanley loko gurutwakarshan bhanda kam tancha
choices.B: loko gurutwakarshanley dherai tancha, tyai karan tapaiko taul kum hunthiyo
choices.C: loko gurutwakarshanley dherai tancha, tyai karan tapaiko taul dherai hunthiyo
choices.D: prithviko gurutwakarshanley tapailai loko gurutwakarshanley bhanda badhi tanthiyo
